snippet: An Army staff sergeant has admitted to shooting his wife and three police officers who showed up at his front door after his wife called 911.
abstract: Army staff sergeant Ronald Hamilton admits to fatally shooting wife in their Virginia home and then firing at police who arrived on scene after she called 911, killing one officer and wounding two others; Hamilton faces multiple murder charges.
lead_paragraph: An Army staff sergeant has admitted to shooting his wife and three police officers who showed up at his front door after his wife called 911.

headline.main: Virginia: Soldier Admitted Killings, Affidavit Says
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Soldier Admitted Killings, Affidavit Says
